articles.author: Harry Baker
articles.title: Astronomers detect first 'radio signal' from interstellar comet 3I/ATLAS — but it wasn't aliens - Live Science
articles.description: Astronomers at South Africa's MeerKAT radio telescope have detected the first radio waves coming from the interstellar comet 3I/ATLAS. But while this sounds suspiciously like alien activity, it is actually further proof of its completely natural origins.
articles.content:
Astronomers have detected the first-ever "radio signal" coming from the interstellar comet 3I/ATLAS
, right as it passed the halfway mark on its oneway trip through the solar system. And while this … [+4841 chars]
